text:
March 27, 1959
Dr. Maurice F. Seay, Director
Division of Education
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Maurice:
Since I know how sincerely you're trying to keep on top of all these
developments, I thought you might like to glance over the attached
three items:
Testimony before the FCC (upcoming)
McLuhan proposal (to reflect a current interest)
Review (in our Journal) of the KPFA report. See page 14.
Sincerely yours.
hjsrrs
Enclosures
Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director
